mapper.insert: INSERT students (name, nickname, kana_name, email, area, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES(#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT students_courses (student_id, course_name, course_start_at, course_end_at) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartAt}, #{courseEndAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE students_courses SET course_name = #{courseName} WHERE id = #{id}
